title: People say that Riot favors ADCs over the rest of the roster...
body:
...But Fiddle's E is Sivir's W but *actually better in nearly every single way*.

Better damage, better targeting (Fiddle's E bounces to targets that he can't see, and can hit the same target multiple times, and prioritizes champions much better than Sivir's W does, *and* has a better bounce radius), bounces faster, has a silence...

Legit the only thing Sivir's W has going over Fiddle's E is that it can hit more than 6 targets. Of course, though, it's never going to do so against anything except minions.

Then again, maybe it's just Fiddle favoritism, given that his E is also nearly as good as Brand's *ult* (And *is* completely better once you pass a certain AP threshold); he has a point and click instant fear, while Shaco is stuck with a delayed one for half the duration; and is one of the last point and click draintanks now that Riot removed that from Aatrox...

...Okay. I do know it's not *favoritism*, and more just Riot probably forgot about him. But for the love of god he's still oppressive beyond belief in any lane, nearly impossible to 1v1 because of his W and Q, impossible to poke down due to his W, and borderline impossible to kill before he kills your entire team in a teamfight because of his entire fucking kit. The only reason people lose on him is because another lane feeds their asses off too much for even a scripter with perfect macro to carry, or because they're drunk/high/asleep/afk/too stupid to actually right-click.

Bit of a rant, sorry.

Fiddle E is not "better" than Sivir W, it's way better on early but Sivir W is definetely better once she has a few crit items.

50 / 55 / 60 / 65 / 70% AD for Sivir's W

60 / 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 (+ 45% AP) is Fiddle's E.

Fiddle's E has a lower scaling, but effective incoming damage will be higher for Fiddle, due to AP:AD availability ratios (assuming the base damage alone doesn't simply make it better). And then there's everything else above (better targeting, silence, better bounce speed). Fiddle's E is better nearly the entire game, until Sivir's full build.

And the odds of her getting 6 items? Not terribly high, due to the pace of games.

But Sivir W can crit...trust me that you cant ignore that.

I play Sivir and you also have to count that her W is an aa reset on an adc.

Eh. The critting is what pushes it over the edge at full build.

Since you play Sivir, you'd know well that most crit items don't contain any AD, with IE being the only exception. This means *half* of your build  (Two zeal items and boots) contains no actual AD, and that half is in your first four items you buy basically every time. Meaning it's not until your *fifth* item you have a *chance* of actually out-damaging him with W.

Crit adcs like Sivir are trolling if they dont buy StormR first, which gives her: flat ad and the guaranted crit that you can use to clear the wave: it actually is awesome on Sivir because you can do W+aa crit, wait for other free crit and aa + wait another time and throw the third W aa being crit to have the max waveclear with just 1 item.

Ofc that it's not like that on a fight and that the crit has reduced dmg until you have more crit and etc etc.

But anyway I still think that Sivir W it's not straight up worse Fiddle E, it's just diferent.

And if you want my opinion about Fiddle supp I will say that's an abomination that should've never existed un the first place, just rework that fking outdated champ already.
